reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft with thick material and appreciate its off-the-shoulder style that makes it look expensive.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chic, cozy, and flattering!
items.body: This LILLUSORY off-the-shoulder sweater is perfection! The oversized fit is super comfy while still looking stylish, and the batwing sleeves give it such a relaxed, effortless vibe. The fabric is soft and cozy without being too heavy, making it easy to dress up or down. I love how versatile it is â€“ I can wear it off one shoulder for a casual look, or both shoulders up for a more classic style. It pairs beautifully with jeans, leggings, or even a skirt. Iâ€™ve gotten so many compliments every time I wear it! If youâ€™re looking for a sweater thatâ€™s cute, comfortable, and feels way more expensive than it is, this one is a winner. Iâ€™ll definitely be ordering more colors! Read more
items.author: Alexandra Jackson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and cute! Perfect fit
items.body: I wasn't sure what to expect from this sweater as I don't usually wear this style. I have broad shoulders so I think that helps as far as keeping it from falling down or the shoulders not staying where they are supposed to. It's a very soft material and very comfortable to wear. Only odd thing is that when I received it, it had some deep wrinkles in it that I had to iron out (and even that took a bit of effort). I haven't washed it yet so I'm not sure how it will hold up over time (only worn it once on a trip to a colder location and it's just hitting fall temps where I live now). The foldover neckline is a bit difficult to fold straight by yourself but once it's on it doesn't seem to move much which is good because I can't stand clothes that I'm constantly fiddling with. The sleeve length is deliberately a little long but I have long arms so that's a plus (I love having very long sleeves but rarely find clothes that fit that way on me). The color I got (apricot) was just like the picture (really more of an oatmeal color than apricot). Overall fit was as expected. I'm 5'9", 138lbs, 36B and the large was perfect on me as an oversized sweater. I wore it with a denim miniskirt and tall brown boots and it was adorable! Read more
items.author: VWHITMORE

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars good quality and soft. oversized
items.body: this was so cute and soft! got asked if it was from aritzia thats how good quality is and looks on Read more
items.author: X. L

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: This sweater is so cute in person and itâ€™s extremely soft. I havenâ€™t washed it yet and I believe the tag says to get it dry cleaned, so I would imagine if you wash it and or dry it will start pilling. The thing I donâ€™t really like about it is that it doesnâ€™t stay on my shoulders well and I thought it was going to be longer like for going over leggings. Thatâ€™s what I was going for but altogether itâ€™s a really cute and soft sweater and Iâ€™m going to keep it. I ordered my usual size large and it fits a little loose but it still looks good. Iâ€™m 5â€™6 38DD and 214 pounds for size reference. I also ordered the color khaki and itâ€™s a cute beige color. Read more
items.author: Azia

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft sweater
items.body: I actually do like the sweater, the material is super soft, not at all scratchy. I ordered one size larger, Yes I wanted an off the shoulder oversized sweater- plus reading the reviews, seemed like it ran small. I wanted to make sure I could wear it off the shoulder. Even though it fits and looks fine in the body/torsoâ€¦ Oh but I cannot wear it off 2 shoulders, Metal It just slips back up not exactly what I was looking for. I would have to order two sizes bigger than what I wanted to get look in the picture shown. Iâ€™m gonna keep it. Iâ€™ll just have to wear it a little differently than planned, I would definitely order one to two sizes bigger if i wanted it oversized. Iâ€™m a true medium . I ordered a large. I would at least order an XL if I wanted it to look like the baggie off the shoulder style. . That being said, itâ€™s very soft good quality the neck will look a little odd if you donâ€™t wear it off the shoulders, but you can work with it. But for $50 sweater, I would hope the sizing chart would be accurate. I ordered blk itâ€™s a light weight sweater but fairly warm l. Biggest complaint would be the sizing issue I wouldâ€™ve known. I definitely wouldâ€™ve ordered a bigger size. I donâ€™t feel like returning it and going through all that hassle.. Read more
items.author: Aimee Bullis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome quality
items.body: Absolutely perfect! This can be dressed up or down and I got it to wear out to the bars! Itâ€™s super soft, and fit perfectly! Obviously witg these types of tops you are gonna have to keep pulling the fold down the off the shoulder part which to me isnt a big deal whatever . It is so cute and stylish and super trendy. Tuck it under into your bra to make it more cropped or wear it with leggings and it covers your butt like an oversized sweater! Havnt washed it yet but itâ€™s super soft so might only wash and then air dry it . Read more
items.author: kaila

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and cozy
items.body: 10/10 buy it itâ€™s so cute got so many compliments and it is a very cute sweater for the weather right now ðŸ¥° It is oversized which I do like I normally donâ€™t like oversized clothing but this is so cute I would buy again in a different color Read more
items.author: maria fernanda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars More than exceeded this tall girls expectations
items.body: I had high hopes for this sweater and it more than met them. I am tall (5â€™10) and slender (size 8 bottom, medium typcially on top). This sweater is super soft and cozy. VERY comfortable to wear. Sleeves were plenty long. I can not wait to wear this and seriously contemplated getting it in other colors after I received it and tried it on. Read more
items.author: Kristina F

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Sage Green, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Orange, Coffee Brown, Darkapricot, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
